attributes.action: Prevent Imperial College London from replacing Pieminister with Starbucks
attributes.background:
Pieminister ensures the joy of Imperial students during their lunch; offering a range of pies to accommodate the whole community; veggies, vegans, gravy & mash lovers.

Replacing this glorious shop with a Starbucks, with already a great cafe in the library, is a proposal only a plonker would make.
